com.github.kevinsawicki.http

Interface HttpRequest.ConnectionFactory

  • Enclosing class:
    HttpRequest

    public static interface HttpRequest.ConnectionFactory
    Creates HTTP connections for urls.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static HttpRequest.ConnectionFactory DEFAULT
      A HttpRequest.ConnectionFactory which uses the built-in URL.openConnection()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpURLConnection create(URL url)
      Open an HttpURLConnection for the specified URL.
      HttpURLConnection create(URL url, Proxy proxy)
      Open an HttpURLConnection for the specified URL and Proxy.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT
